Verses: 1 dhevane, Neer Engalai Endrendraikkum En Thallividugireer? Umadhu Meychchalin Aadugalmel Umadhu Kobam En Pugaigiradhu?
2 neer Poorvakaalaththil Sambaadhiththa Umadhu Sabaiyaiyum, Neer Meettukkonda Umadhu Sudhandharamaana Koththiraththaiyum, Neer Vaasamaayirundha Seeyon Parvadhaththaiyum Ninaiththarulum.
3 nedunkaalamaagap Paazhaaikkidakkira Sthalangalil Ummudaiya Paadhangalai Ezhundharulappannum; Parisuththa Sthalaththile Saththuru Anaiththaiyum Keduththuppottaan.
4 ummudaiya Saththurukkal Ummudaiya Aalayangalukkulle Kerchchiththu, Thangal Kodigalai Adaiyaalangalaaga Naattugiraargal.
5 kodarigalai Ongich Solaiyile Marangalai Vettugiravan Perpetravanaanaan.
6 ippozhudho Avargal Adhin Siththiravelaigal Muzhuvadhaiyum Vaachchigalaalum Sammattigalaalum Thagarththuppodugiraargal.
7 umadhu Parisuththa Sthalaththai Akkinikku Iraiyaakki, Umadhu Naamaththin Vaasasthalaththaith Tharaimattum Idiththu, Asuththappaduththinaargal.
8 avargalai Egamaai Nirththooliyaakkuvom Endru Thangal Irudhayaththil Solli, Dhesaththilulla Aalayangalaiyellaam Sutteriththuppottaargal.
9 engalukku Irundha Adaiyaalangalaik Kaanom; Theerkkadharisiyum Illai; Idhu Edhuvaraikkum Endru Arigiravanum Engalidaththil Illai.
10 dhevane, Edhuvaraikkum Saththuru Nindhippaan? Pagaivan Umadhu Naamaththai Eppozhudhum Dhooshippaano?
11 umadhu Valadhukaraththai En Mudakkikkollugireer; Adhai Umadhu Madiyilirundhu Eduththu Ongi Nirmoolamaakkum.
12 boomiyin Naduvil Ratchippugalaich Seydhuvarugira Dhevan Poorvakaalamudhal Ennudaiya Raajaa.
13 dhevareer Umadhu Vallamaiyinaal Samuththiraththai Irandaagap Pilandhu, Jalaththilulla Valusarppangalin Thalaigalai Udaiththeer.
14 dhevareer Mudhalaigalin Thalaigalai Narukkippottu, Adhai Vanaandharaththu Janangalukku Unavaagak Koduththeer.
15 ootraiyum Aatraiyum Pilandhuvitteer; Magaa Nadhigalaiyum Vatrippogappannineer.
16 pagalum Ummudaiyadhu, Iravum Ummudaiyadhu; Dhevareer Oliyaiyum Sooriyanaiyum Padaiththeer.
17 boomiyin Ellaigalaiyellaam Thittampannineer; Kodaikaalaththaiyum Maarikaalaththaiyum Undaakkineer.
18 karththaave, Saththuru Ummai Nindhiththadhaiyum, Madhiyeena Janangal Umadhu Naamaththaith Thooshiththadhaiyum Ninaiththukkollum.
19 umadhu Kaattuppuraavin Aaththumaavaith Dhushtarudaiya Koottaththirku Oppukkodaadheyum; Umadhu Ezhaigalin Koottaththai Endraikkum Maravaadheyum.
20 ummudaiya Udanpadikkaiyai Ninaiththarulum; Boomiyin Irulaana Idangal Kodumaiyulla Kudiyiruppugalaal Niraindhirukkiradhe.
21 thunbappattavan Vetkaththode Thirumbavidaadhirum; Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavan Umadhu Naamaththaith Thudhikkumpadi Seyyum.
22 dhevane, Ezhundharulum, Umakkaaga Neere Vazhakkaadum; Madhiyeenanaale Naadorum Umakku Varum Nindhaiyai Ninaiththukkollum.
23 ummudaiya Saththurukkalin Aaravaaraththai Maravaadheyum; Umakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbugiravargalin Amali Eppozhudhum Adhigarikkiradhu.
